books.title: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING
books.author: Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.

books.title: IT ENDS WITH US
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.

books.title: FRENCH BRAID
books.author: Anne Tyler
books.description: The ups and downs of a Baltimore family from the 1950s to the pandemic present.

books.title: RECESSIONAL
books.author: David Mamet
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning playwright lambastes liberal politics, cancel culture and other things he finds objectionable.

books.title: EDUCATED
books.author: Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.

books.title: SEA OF TRANQUILITY
books.author: Emily St. John Mandel
books.description: A detective investigating in the wilderness discovers that his actions might affect the timeline of the universe.

quotes.title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
quotes.author: ‎Lewis Carroll
quotes.text: My dear, here we must run as fast as we can, just to stay in place. And if you wish to go anywhere you must run twice as fast as that.

quotes.title: The Great Gatsby
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
quotes.text: Whenever you feel like criticizing any one,» he told me, «just remember that all the people in this world haven’t had the advantages that you’ve had.
